parameter.name: apiUrl
parameter.description: Base endpoint URL of Elasticsearch API.

parameter.name: pretty
parameter.description: The boolean flag to indicate whether the JSON response is to be returned as pretty formatted.

parameter.name: format
parameter.description: Indicates whether the results to be returned in more readable yaml format.

parameter.name: human
parameter.description: The boolean flag to indicate whether the response is to be returned in human readable format.

parameter.name: filterPath
parameter.description: The comma separated list of filters expressed with the dot notation.

parameter.name: flatSettings
parameter.description: The boolean flag to indicate whether the response is to be returned in the flat format.

parameter.name: callback
parameter.description: The boolean flag to indicate whether the response is to be returned as JSONP result.

parameter.name: case
parameter.description: When set to camelCase, all field names in the result will be returned in camel casing, otherwise, underscore casing will be used.
